title: iConic Apple - Novelty Never Wears Off - Q4 Earnings Preview
text:
'iConic Apple' - Novelty Never Wears Off - Q4 Earnings Preview 
RTT News Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
The iconic company, which relegated tech giants IBM, Google and Microsoft behind it with its behemoth 648.74 billion market capitalization, is making headlines again. Those of you who wish to take a bite out of it stay tuned! Apple is set to report its fourth quarter results after the close of market on Tuesday, October 27. Piper Jaffray's veteran Apple analyst Gene Munster has rated the company in his top large cap stock pick for 2015, and into 2016 and has a $172 price target for its stock.Apple, which made its presence known with the iconic iPod and iMacs and was once branded a one-trick po...
